original_text: And the people of Israel went into the midst of the sea on dry ground, the waters being a wall to them on their right hand and on their left.
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 바다 가운데를 육지로 걸어가고 물은 그들의 좌우에 벽이 되니

sentences.original_text: And the people of Israel went into the midst of the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 백성은 바다 한가운데로 들어갔습니다

sentences.original_text: the waters being a wall to them
on their right hand and on their left.
